analysis.description:
HappyToken.happyTeamWallet (/unique_chucks/19/0x94c7300b007126a467ed144c7926a503ffa4e6c1.sol#105-106) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- constructor (/unique_chucks/19/0x94c7300b007126a467ed144c7926a503ffa4e6c1.sol#118-126)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x94c7300b007126a467ed144c7926a503ffa4e6c1.sol:
	Contract HappyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x94c7300b007126a467ed144c7926a503ffa4e6c1.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/19/0x94c7300b007126a467ed144c7926a503ffa4e6c1.sol#65-68) is not in mixedCase
